title: PBE Account Creation Help
body:
Hey! I know you guys are getting a whole lot of these questions, but I just have a quick question. I've gone through the process of creating a PBE account already, and I just want to know when I can use it to log in. Do I get an email saying it's been created? Or does it work right away (It's not). Thank you so much for your time! Sorry for clogging up H&P board

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: It should work right away, but you need to make sure you are specifically using the PBE client which connects to that region!

Hey, I have the same problem here. E-mail not working, can't log in, etc
But when I try to create an account it just says I already made one. I already submitted an ticket but I thought you might be able to help.
Thanks anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KOnEQtV2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-14T20:30:05.490+0000)
>
> It should work right away, but you need to make sure you are specifically using the PBE client which connects to that region!

Hello! I did download the client, still not working. I tried to recover my username and password but I'm not getting any emails. Thanks for responding!
Just to clarify, I'm getting the "username or password incorrect" message. Should I try applying again?

If you created already, it shouldn't be possible to make another.  Hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can see what happened to your account!
Nevermind! That did the trick! Just re-applied and it works now! Thanks for the help.
